column1: #Text=Golda Meir, Indira Gandhi, Maggie Thatcher, Angela Merkel, Benazir Bhutto, and more have made it happen.
#Text=We even had one, however briefly, here in Canada.
#Text=Clinton did not win the presidency because she was perceived by the people to be deeply flawed.
#Text=It had nothing to do with her gender; the Americans would have loved to have a female President!
